001.quote: Folks are like plants; we all lean toward the light.

002.quote: You gotta water your plants. Nobody can water them for you.

003.quote: Plant and your spouse plants with you; weed and you weed alone.

004.quote: Plants are not like us, and the more you study plants, the more different and deep ways you see that they are not like us.

005.quote: Organisms don't think of CO2 as a poison. Plants and organisms that make shells, coral, think of it as a building block.

006.quote: I am a gardener, I have a big green thumb, and I can take care of these plants really easily because they are all fake.
